It is a wholly Government-owned Corporation with a 51% share of the State Government and a 49% share of the Government of India. \n Under this scheme, loans are provided to Safai Karamcharis and their dependents for any viable income-generating activities with a maximum cost of up to \u20b915,00,000/- per beneficiary. These income-generating activities include auto repair and spare parts shops, electrical goods workshops, leather footwear manufacturing units, beauty parlors, welding works, carpentry, photography, grocery shops, sanitary supply stores, ready-made garments, cyber cafes, band parties, tent houses, etc.
